subject: Re: Junit4.9b1 not work
msgSnippet: Emanuela, Please include the user group on each mail by using reply to all , so other people get a chance to help. What happens if you run jar tf
messageBody:
Emanuela,

Please include the user group on each mail by using "reply to all", so
other people get a chance to help.

What happens if you run

jar tf C:\TOOL_TEST\JUnit\junit4.9b1\junit4.9b1.jar

?

Thanks,

David Saff

On Wed, Jan 19, 2011 at 8:57 AM, Emanuela Bertelli <manuspa_72@...> wrote:
> David thanks for the quick response.
> Yes and I have same problem,I'm sorry but at the moment isn't possible for
> me to run with junit.
> Is possible help me?
> Thank you so much Emanuela
>
> ________________________________
> Da: David Saff <david@...>
> A: Emanuela <manuspa_72@...>; junit@yahoogroups.com
> Inviato: Mer 19 gennaio 2011, 14:44:10
> Oggetto: Re: Junit4.9b1 not work
>
> Emanuela,
>
> Have you tried with junit-4.8.2.jar?  Do you have the same problem?
>
>   David
>
> On Wed, Jan 19, 2011 at 5:35 AM, Emanuela <manuspa_72@...> wrote:
>> I have install in the C:\TOOL_TEST\JUnit\junit4.9b1
>>
>> This is my set enviroment for CLASSPATH:
>>
>>
>> C:\TOOL_TEST\JUnit\junit4.9b1\junit4.9b1.jar;C:\TOOL_TEST\JUnit\junit4.9b1\org;C:\TOOL_TEST\JUnit\junit4.9b1;C:\TOOL_TEST\JUnit\junit4.9b1\javadoc;C:\TOOL_TEST\JUnit\junit4.9b1\junit\tests
>>
>>
>> But when  I lunch
>>
>> java org.junit.runner.JUnitCore org.junit.tests.AllTests
>>
>>
>> the response is:
>>
>> java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: org/junit/runner/JUnitCore
>> Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: org.junit.runner.JUnitCore
>>        at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source)
>>        at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method)
>>        at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source)
>>        at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
>>        at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
>>        at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
>> Could not find the main class: org.junit.runner.JUnitCore.  Program will
>> exit.
>> Exception in thread "main"
>>
>> Is possible help me,
>>
>> Thank you Emanuela
>>
>>
>>
>>
>
>
